name: flame

flame noun
(FIRE)
Add to word list

B2 [ C or U ] a stream of hot, burning gas from something on fire: The flames grew larger as the fire spread.burst into flames The car flipped over and burst into flames (= started burning immediately).in flames When the fire engine arrived the house was already in flames (= burning).

flame verb
(SHOW ANGER)
[ I/T ] to show anger by turning red: [ I ] His face flamed and he started stammering.
[ I/T ] If you flame someone you disagree with, you send insulting electronic messages about that person over the Internet: [ T ] He was flamed by several other people in the chat room.
